amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part C of House Report 117-15 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 2, 3, 4, and 6.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Courtney amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. Courtney.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. Courtney.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Courtney amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Courtney amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
